title: 131 — 1 "The First Patient! The Untold Story of the Rumble Ball!"Transliteration: "Hajimete no Kanja! Ranburu Bōru Hiwa" (Japanese:はじめての患者! ランブルボール秘話) Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada November 3, 2002(2002-11-03)[15] —
transformers_text: 131 1 The First Patient The Untold Story of the Rumble Ball Transliteration Hajime te no K anja Ran buru B ru H iwa Japanese Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada November 3 2002 2002 11 03 15 The Straw Hats land on an uninhabited island Sanji immediately notices that it is covered with fruit bearing trees The crew decides to divide the work by drawing straws Luffy Zoro and Us opp are sent to gather the fruit while Nami and Sanji survey the island Chopper is left to guard the ship He enjoys himself but suddenly realizes that Robin is nearby and flees into the cabin He works on producing Rumble Balls and talks to himself about his mentor Dr Kure ha but notices that Robin is listening to him and breaks a barrel of water in surprise Robin accompanies Chopper as he goes to replace the spilled liquid and he tells Robin about Dr Kure ha and how she became his first patient
tf_idf_text: first patient untold story rumble ball transliteration hajime anja run buru iwa japanese yuji endo michiru shimada november straw hat land uninhabited island sanji immediately notice cover fruit bearing tree crew decides divide work draw straws luffy zoro opp send gather fruit nami sanji survey island chopper leave guard ship enjoy suddenly realize robin nearby flees cabin work produce rumble ball talk mentor kure notice robin listen break barrel water surprise robin accompany chopper go replace spilled liquid tell robin kure become first patient
